Name: Aziza
description:
Aziza is 26 years old and lives with her child in Dj. Rasulov, Tajikistan. She was born into a family of farmers and has a farm on a small plot of land. She has been farming for six years and she is manages her business alone. She has rented a plot of land two hectares in area and sows a crop of potatoes, cucumbers, maize, and corn.

Aziza has taken out and successfully repaid a previous loan through Kiva's field partner IMON International and has a positive credit history. She has now applied for a 7,000 TJS loan to buy mineral fertilizers and pay laborers for their work. She will mix the fertilizers in with the soil to improve the quality of her crops.

Aziza hopes to get a good harvest next season. She awaits your support and mercy.
